attributes.action: investigate the impact that the proposed Super League franchises will have on National League clubs and supporting communities/businesses in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We firmly believe that the franchise system will be very damaging for National League clubs and businesses run around them.

How many National Legue Clubs will go into administration or worse because of the proposed Franchises?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "investigate the impact that the proposed Super League franchises will have on National League clubs and supporting communities/businesses in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17312


Prime Minister's Office
